overview: You don't become one of the world's best chef's by being nice. To be in Jordan Ramsem's kitchen you better be able to take it in the ass, follow direction and fuck hard! Featuring Kagney Linn Karter and directed by Stuart Canterbury! This ain't your regular cooking show! When the heat is turned up, we get  TURNED ON!
tagline: When the heat is turned up, we get  TURNED ON!
title: This Ain't Hell's Kitchen XXX
